author: Stefan R uping
title: A Simple Method For Estimating Conditional Probabilities For SVMs
venue: CS Department, AI Unit Dortmund University
window: a business cycle analysis problem (business), an analysis of a direct mailing application (directmailing), a data set from a life insurance company (insurance) and intensive care patient monitoring data (medicine). Prior to learning, nominal attributes were binarised and the attributes were scaled to expectancy 0
